item.title: How Trump could spare Biden's renewable energy credits and still cripple his landmark climate bill
item.description: Trump's nominees could hold considerable power over the interpretation and implementation of the IRA's programs and tax incentives.

item.title: November home sales surged more than expected, boosted by lower mortgage rates
item.description: Sales of previously owned homes rose 4.8% in November compared with October, according to the National Association of Realtors

item.title: Luigi Mangione agrees to extradition to New York in UnitedHealthcare CEO murder case
item.description: Luigi Mangione is charged with first-degree murder and other counts in the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York.

item.title: GA appeals court disqualifies DA Fani Willis from Trump election case, lets indictment stand
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump and others are charged in Georgia with crimes related to efforts to overturn his 2020 election loss to President Joe Bide...

item.title: Malls are using new restaurants to draw consumers as shopping centers reinvent themselves
item.description: Malls are adding new dining options, like Din Tai Fung and Eataly, to attract customers.
